Description.Text: There is a spacious outdoor pool with sun-lounger terrace, and offers air-conditioned studios with balconies, and fully-equipped kitchens. Mermaid Studios are bright and have simple furnishings. In the morning the pool bar serves a full English breakfast. At night guests can enjoy dancing and cocktails.
Hotel is located in the middle of Paleokastritsa Resort, 700m from the beach, 22km from Corfu town & 23km from the airport. .
